text: If you choose to enable any Third-Party Services to interoperate with the Services, such as Zoom or Google Meet, the third-party provider may share some information about you, including Customer Data collected by the Third Party Service from your device audio and video streams.

In order to provide the Services, we may collect information from audio and video streams through your device or video-conferencing solution.
This Privacy Policy (" Policy ") applies to services provided by WiserAI, Inc. (" we ", " us ", or " WiserAI ") and our website, product pages, mobile or web applications, or other digital products that link to or reference this Policy (collectively, the " Services ") and explains what information we collect from users of our Services (a " user ", " you ", or " your "), including information that may be used to personally identify you (" Personal Information ") and how we use it.
We may also collect and receive information from other sources:
We may engage joint marketing, referral, and other channel partners and may receive or transmit information with such partners that we engage for joint marketing activities and our referrals and rewards programs.
We receive other information from you when you choose to interact with us in other ways, such as if you sign up for one of our webinars or newsletters, participate in a survey or event, or otherwise communicate with us.
We use Google Analytics to help collect and analyze certain information for the purposes discussed in this Policy.
